title: Samson Godwin
text:
Samson Godwin (born 11 November 1983) is a former <a href="Nigerian">Nigerian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
Career.
Godwin started his football career in a <a href="Nigeria%20Division%201">Nigerian first division</a> club <a href="Gabros%20F.C.">Gabros F.C.</a> at the age of 17, after playing for a season in <a href="Nigeria">Nigeria</a>, young footballer was noticed by scouts from <a href="Poland">Poland</a>, and the following season, in 2000 Godwin moved to <a href="Europe">Europe</a>, playing for Polish club <a href="Podbeskidzie%20Bielsko-Bia%C5%82a">Marbet Ceramed Bielsko-Biała</a>. After one season at Marbet, Godwin moved to another Polish club <a href="GKS%20Katowice">GKS Katowice</a>. However, not finding much success there in spring of 2002, Samson Godwin moved to <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> club <a href="FC%20Karpaty%20Lviv">Karpaty Lviv</a>, where he has remained since. He is a regular for the club and has played over 100 games (98 League and 10 Cup competitions). He spent the first half of 2009 on loan to <a href="FC%20Shakhter%20Karagandy">FC Shakhter Karagandy</a>.
In 2006, while playing for Karpaty, Godwin was a candidate for a spot in <a href="Nigeria%20National%20Football%20Team">Nigerian national Team</a>, and then coach <a href="Augustine%20Eguavoen">Augustine Eguavoen</a>, visited the game <a href="FC%20Karpaty%20Lviv">Karpaty Lviv</a> vs <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Kyiv">Dynamo Kyiv</a> to witness the Godwin's game and see the progress of Dynamo's Nigerian midfielder <a href="Ayila%20Yussuf">Ayila Yussuf</a>.
Personal life.
Godwin claims that after his football career comes to an end he would prefer to stay in <a href="Ukraine">Ukraine</a> and become a businessman.
His best friend off the pitch is a former Karpaty player, and a current striker for another Ukrainian club <a href="FC%20Kharkiv">FC Kharkiv</a>, <a href="William%20Batista">William Batista</a>. He is also friends with Nigerian footballer <a href="Lucky%20Idahor">Lucky Idahor</a>, who has formerly performed for Karpaty, and is currently playing for <a href="FC%20Tavriya%20Simferopol">Tavriya Simferopol</a>. Godwin's favourite footballers are <a href="Zinedine%20Zidane">Zinedine Zidane</a> and <a href="Claude%20Mak%C3%A9l%C3%A9l%C3%A9">Claude Makélélé</a>.
